title: (very) small error in javadoc of : org.assertj.core.api.Assertions#within(long, java.time.temporal.TemporalUnit)
description:
There is a small error in the java doc of org.assertj.core.api.Assertions#within(long, java.time.temporal.TemporalUnit)
"Assertions entry point for TemporalUnitOffset with with less than or equal condition to use with isCloseTo temporal assertions."

"with" is doubled

  • assertj core version: 3.7.0
description_text:
There is a small error in the java doc of org.assertj.core.api.Assertions#within(long, java.time.temporal.TemporalUnit)
"Assertions entry point for TemporalUnitOffset with with less than or equal condition to use with isCloseTo temporal assertions."
"with" is doubled

assertj core version: 3.7.0
